title: Orion's Belt: Birth of the Hunter
description: This novel is a work of fiction loosely based on historic events and is dedicated to the fighting men and women of the United States. The book's inspiration includes the events of 9-11 and the global unrest we currently face. In troubled times we have always looked to our military for defense and strategy, and this is especially true at this point in our nation's history. It is our warriors in harm's way whom we herald as our heroes. Stay safe.
author: John Peter Ferris
